sentences.en: After receiving notification, the assignor shall assist the assignee in removing any obstacles.
sentences.cn: 让与人接到通知后, 应当协助受让人排除妨碍.

sentences.en: Article39 Where a registered trademark is assigned, the assignor and assignee shall conclude a contract for the assignment, and jointly file an application with the trademark Office.
sentences.cn: 第三十九条转让注册商标的，转让人和受让人应当签订转让协议，并共同向商标局提出申请。

sentences.en: By filing a joint application with the assignee with the Trademark Office.
sentences.cn: 你可以和授权人共同向商标局提出申请.

sentences.en: Costs incurred for intermediary and agent business or for acting as assignee.
sentences.cn: 指因居间及代理业务或受委?等所应负担之成本.

sentences.en: Goodwill assignee, meeting the statutory requirements, can also be obtained ownership, even if the grantor punishment.
sentences.cn: 善意受让人, 满足法定条件, 纵使让与人无处分处,亦可取得所有权.

sentences.en: Revenues earned from compensation for intermediary and agent business or for acting as an assignee.
sentences.cn: 指因居间及代理业务或受委?等报酬所得之收入.

sentences.en: Upon receipt of the notice of assignment of the obligee's right, the obligor may, in respect of the assignee, avail itself of any defense it has against the assignor.
sentences.cn: 第八十三条债务人接到债权转让通知时，债务人对让与人享有债权，并且债务人的债权先于转让的债权到期或者同时到期的，债务人可以向受让人主张抵销。

words.tran_cn: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让
代理人；[法][经]受托人；分配到任务的人

trans.tran_cn: 受托人，代理人，受让人，被指定人
trans.tran_en: a person to whom some right, interest, or property is transferred
